name: Santa Jump! Adventure
description:
Merry Christmas!
If you love fly games then enjoy this classic flying skill adventure game!
It's Christmas Time,but our Santa was in trouble - the Christmas gifts for the children were not enough!
Now help him to have a adventure in the dangerous sky island,where has a lot of sweet candies!
Plan your flight path,control your fuel,think how to avoid traps and shells,collect all the candy in each level.

Very interesting puzzle game for kids!
